page.title: 09CLUBS & SOCIETIES
page.content: Langton Green and Fordcome both have a number of clubs or societies where people with similar interests meet, often in the village halls. There are local branches of the Women's Institute and Young Wives as well as a group called The Langton Ladies. The "Over 60's" mainly supported by retired Pensioners is very popular. The younger generation may join a Guide or Scout Pack or its younger counterpart and there is a Youth Club for teen-agers. Creative activities include Horticulture, Art and Flower Arranging. There are Football, Cricket, Badminton and Stoolball clubs which play clubs elsewhere and a Keep Fit group. Beside meeting for pleasure members of the British Legion help ex-service people. Both villages have Preservation Societies to monitor any proposed building development.
